title: 3 Magazines Font ID
content:
Hi,

I would truly appreciate your  
help in ID'ing the font in these  
3 magazines (circled in 'red' & 'blue').

Thanks for your time.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140424044949im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Magazine_1_3808.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140424044949im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Magazine_2_4170.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140424044949im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Magazine_3_5493.jpg)
author: tm6464

comments.content:
Please post these as three separate requests. That will make tracking them easier for us. Please use titles that fit each sample.

Thanks,  
- Mike Yanega
